exam.question: I think that I committed a ______ in asking her because she seemed very upset by my question.

answer.explain: 句意： 我认为去问她是犯了一个错误， 因为她似乎对我的问题感到很不安。revenge： 复仇， 与take或have连用； reproach： 责备； scandal： 丑闻。

sentences.sContent: They blundered badly when they gave him the job.
sentences.sCn: 他们犯了大错，让他做这份工作。

remMethod.val: blu(看作blue， 忧郁) ＋ (u)nder(在…下面) → 在忧郁心情的笼罩下， 喝醉了酒 → 跌跌撞撞地走

words.tran: 轻率粗心的人；犯愚蠢错误的人

trans.tranCn: 跌跌撞撞地走， 慌乱地走； 犯错误
trans.tranOther: to move in an unsteady way, as if you cannot see properly
